resources.string: The selected items will be deleted.
The selected item will be deleted.
The previous backed up App data will be overwritten. Would you like to continue?
Do you want to stop the backup?
Do you want to stop the restoring?
Not enough storage, please clean the SD card and try again
Restore is stopping, please wait for a moment.
Reboot when the applications be selected
The current App data will be overwritten. Would you like to continue?
"Phone memory is full, can't import messages any more, please delete some old messages."
Backup and Recover for the China Mobile custom phone, can be used on the China Mobile custom phone of all brands.

"Backup via SD card: · Insert an SD card · Select \"Start backup\" · Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\"
Backup via computer: · Select \"Start backup\" and remember the backup location. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location "(you can find it in Backup settings)" to your computer. · Connect the new device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\"
Restore via SD card: · Insert an SD card to the previous device. · Select \"Start backup\" · Remove the SD card and insert it into this device. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\"
Restore via computer: · Connect the previous device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location of the previous device to your computer. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to "Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app" according to its type. Please create these folders, if they do not exist. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\" "

"Backup via SD card: · Insert an SD card · Select \"Start backup\" · Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\"
Backup via computer: · Select \"Start backup\" and remember the backup location. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location "(you can find it in Backup settings)" to your computer. · Connect the new device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\" "

"Restore via SD card: · Insert an SD card to the previous device. · Select \"Start backup\" · Remove the SD card and insert it into this device. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\"
Restore via computer: · Connect the previous device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location of the previous device to your computer. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to "Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app" according to its type. Please create these folders, if they do not exist. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\" "

"After backup, you can: · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location "(you can find it in Backup settings)" to your computer. · Connect the new device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\"
If no backup file being found, you can: · Connect the previous device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location of the previous device to your computer. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to "Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app" according to its type. Please create these folders, if they do not exist. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\" "

"After backup, you can: · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location "(you can find it in Backup settings)" to your computer. · Connect the new device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to the new device. · Open the Backup app of the new device, and select \"Start restore\" "

"If no backup file being found, you can: · Connect the previous device to your computer. · Copy your backup file from the backup location of the previous device to your computer. · Connect this device to your computer. · Copy the backup file from your computer to "Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app" according to its type. Please create these folders, if they do not exist. · Open the Backup app of this device, and select \"Start restore\" "
"Files will backup in internal storage. If need recover in new device, you can copy backup files to new device by transferring from an SD card, or by using your computer. "
"No backup file is found. You can copy it from your previous device to this one by transferring from an SD card, or by using your computer. "
"You can copy backup file to new device by operating via computer to restore. "
"No backup file is found. You can copy it from former device to this one by operating via computer to restore. "
Not enough space, please clean up storage and try again
SD card has been removed, please reset
"Set to restore to SD card, but can't find SD card"
Backup path can not find: %1$s, Please reset
Restore path can not find: %1$s, Please reset
Restore unsuccessfully: calendar have no accounts
This application only can work in owner mode
